FileFormat.FormatDescription: OnmiPage is Optical Character Recognition (OCR) software for harvesting text from scanned documents and images.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints / The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints
FileFormat.ProvenanceDescription: This format can be identified via a container signature in DROID version 6.5 or later. The PRONOM database cannot currently represent container signatures.
